Library
```{r}
install.packages("BioPerl")
library(tidyverse)
```


Loading the data
```{r}
data <- read_delim("Downloads/dataset/anage_data.txt", 
                   delim = "\t", 
                   escape_double = FALSE, 
                   trim_ws = TRUE)
```

Checking the data
```{r}
str(data)
```


```{r}
mammalia <- data[data$Class == "Mammalia",]
```

```{r}
mammalia_subset <- subset(mammalia, 
                          `Data quality` != "low" & `Sample size` != c("small", "tiny)"  )
```
